page.title: 18LEISURE IN CORSHAM
page.content: Most people we asked said, "There's nothing to do in Corsham". We found this was not true. There is a wide range of activities for all ages if you bother to look. We found weight training and swimming at the pool. Youth clubs, evening classes, play school and luncheons are all held at the Mansion House. The Squash Centre has two main sports, squash and keep fit. At the fire station they hold a skittles evening on Fridays. At the Corsham Community Centre they hold discos, skittles, dances and concerts. The Corsham Cricket ground is used for cricket in the summer and hockey in the winter. Twice a year the fair comes for three or four days. There was once a cinema but that closed about five years ago.
